channel.title: I Need to Ponder
channel.description: Recent content on I Need to Ponder

item.title: Solutions for Back Pain, Tension and Other Pain
item.description: The Purpose of This Article Although I use the word ‘Back’ Painâ€¦ I’m going to be using it as an umbrella term for muscle, neck, and shoulder pain as well. For years now I’ve struggled with a lot of pain and tension largely from not moving enough. And so have a lot of you. Nearly everyone I’ve talked to who works a desk job at some point been troubled with back, neck, shoulder, wrist pain, or just felt crappy from being immobile for long periods.
